Dear [Teacher's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to sincerely apologize for my actions during the recent test. I regret to admit that I cheated, and I am truly ashamed of my behavior.

I understand that my actions not only undermine the trust you place in me as a student, but they also discredit the hard work of my classmates who approach their studies with honesty and integrity. I want you to know that I have reflected deeply on this mistake and fully recognize the importance of academic honesty. 

I take full responsibility for my actions and the disappointment they have caused. I am committed to learning from this experience and ensuring it never happens again. I appreciate the effort you put into teaching and the value of the lessons you impart, both academically and in life.

Thank you for your understanding, and I hope to regain your trust over time. 

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Class/Grade]
